item.title: How Do We Translate Cultural Experiences Into Data Stories?
item.description: Sketchnote of talk about Kontinentalist Mick Yang & Isabella Chua spoke at Outlier about the amazing work by Kontinentalist team. This was my favorite talk from Day #1. They showcased a series of inspiring & unique data stories based on their cultural experiences. From Rohingya refugees to chillis & queues in Asia â€” so many interesting topics! What I loved was their process of creating these beautiful data stories:
